snippet: A 20-year-old New Jersey singer and her label, Astralwerks, release her first full album on Aug. 28, which may bring her half a million Twitter followers, some of them fans since Halsey was 14, to tears.
abstract: Pop star Ashley Nicolette Frangipane, better known as Halsey to her millions of fans on social media, is hoping to bring her music to the mainstream with release of her first album Badlands.
lead_paragraph: A 20-year-old New Jersey singer and her label, Astralwerks, release her first full album on Aug. 28, which may bring her half a million Twitter followers, some of them fans since Halsey was 14, to tears.

headline.main: Halsey, With ‘Badlands,’ Is Moving Fast to Share a Secret Language
headline.print_headline: Moving Fast to Share a Secret Language
